mapper.select: select count(*) from project where pro_mgr = #{id}
select count(*) from todo where id=#{id} and t_rend is null
select count(*) from SCHEDULE where sch_end >= sysdate and sch_rend is null and pro_id=#{pro_id}
select count(*) from SCHEDULE where sch_rend is not null and pro_id=#{pro_id}

select count(cid) total,c.pro_id,id from ( select count(a.id) as cid,a.t_id, a.id,pj.pro_id from project pj, sch_team st, (select sch_id,t_id,id,t_start,t_end,t_rend from todo group by sch_id,t_id,id,t_start,t_end,t_rend ) a where pj.pro_id = st.pro_id and a.sch_id = st.sch_id and pj.pro_id=#{pro_id} group by a.t_id,a.id,pj.pro_id order by a.t_id asc)c group by c.pro_id,c.id order by total desc

select sc.sch_name sch_name, to_char(sc.sch_start,'YYYY-MM-dd') sch_start, to_char(sc.sch_end,'YYYY-MM-dd') sch_end ,td.id id from schedule sc, todo td where sc.sch_id = td.sch_id and td.id=id order by sch_start desc
select * from schedule where sysdate+3 >= sch_start and sysdate < sch_start and pro_id =#{pro_id} order by sch_id desc
select DISTINCT(tl.tl_id) tl_id,tl.tl_info tl_info,td.id id from timeline tl, schedule sc,todo td where tl.pro_id = sc.pro_id and sc.sch_id = td.sch_id and td.id=#{id} order by tl.tl_id desc
mapper.update: update member set bg_img=#{bgsel} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select bg_img from member where id=#{id}
